sentence.Network_en: Yun Tianhe: What theurgy? I don't know about it!
sentence.Network_cn: 云天河: 什么仙术? 我不会 啊 !

sentence.Network_en: Han Lingsha: Hey! Keep calm and listen to me. Let's confront him by theurgy together!
sentence.Network_cn: 韩菱纱: 喂, 你静下心来听我念咒,我们一起用仙术对付他!

PerfectNetExp.abs: cause-英汉词典-英中字典-速译通... ... [effort( 努力,成就)] [theurgy( 神通,神力,法术,妖术)] [destiny( 命运,定数)].
近似字词-新浪字典 ... theta 希蜡字母的第八字 theurgy 神通,奇迹,仙术,妖术 theveresin 黄夹竹桃素.
theurer 特雷尔, theurgy 罗库, theuret 特雷

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: via late Latin from Greek theourgia 'sorcery', from theos 'god' + -ergos 'working'

means.word_mean: 1. magic performed with the help of beneficent spirits
